segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃsājīvo sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is fit to share their life with their spiritual companions.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, sīlasampadāya kathāya ca kataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti;
segments.en: A mendicant is personally accomplished in ethics, and answers questions posed when discussing accomplishment in ethics.

segments.pli: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti, samādhisampadāya kathāya ca kataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti;
segments.en: They’re personally accomplished in immersion, and they answer questions posed when discussing accomplishment in immersion.

segments.pli: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, paññāsampadāya kathāya ca kataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti;
segments.en: They’re personally accomplished in wisdom, and they answer questions posed when discussing accomplishment in wisdom.

segments.pli: attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadāya kathāya ca kataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti;
segments.en: They’re personally accomplished in freedom, and they answer questions posed when discussing accomplishment in freedom.

segments.pli: attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya kathāya ca kataṃ pañhaṃ byākattā hoti.
segments.en: They’re personally accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, and they answer questions posed when discussing accomplishment in the knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃsājīvo sabrahmacārīnan”ti.
segments.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is fit to share their life with their spiritual companions.”
